organization.description: Our mission is to protect human health and the environment.
organization.title: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency
organization.name: epa-gov

name: bp-spill-sampling-and-monitoring-data-april-september-2010-data-download-tool
notes: This dataset analyzes waste from the the British Petroleum Deepwater Horizon Rig Explosion Emergency Response, providing opportunity to query data sets by metadata criteria and find resulting raw datasets in CSV format.The data query tool allows users to download air, water and sediment sampling and monitoring data that has been collected in response to the BP oil spill. All sampling and monitoring data that has been collected to date is available for download as raw structured data.The query tools enables CSV file creation to be refined based on the following search criteria: date range (between April 28, 2010 and 9/29/2010); location by zip, city, or county; media (solid waste, weathered oil, air, surface water, liquid waste, tar, sediment, water); substance categories (based on media selection) and substances (based on substance category selection).

extras.value: [{"name": "U.S. EPA Office of Solid Waste and Emergency Response (OSWER) - Office of Emergency Management (OEM)", "roles": ["owner"]}]
